about_the_game:
Alone with a girl in a closed VR space
It's just you and the girl in the closed room.
She will initially seem to reject you, but as you progress through her game, she will gradually become more obedient.
Let's train her carefully without rushing her.

To train her, you will need to use your hands to give her pleasure.
Hands and fingers can move in conjunction with the controller.
You can stimulate her vagina by placing your hand on her vagina and actually pushing and pulling the trigger button with your finger.
In addition, the thrust during sex is linked to the trigger button on the controller, so
You can perform thrust to her own favorite rhythm.
(You can also set it to perform thrust automatically)

Also, you can use the controller to move freely within the VR space, so
You can move the camera to your desired position just by operating the controller without moving from the spot.
By using the grip button, you can make subtle adjustments to the camera.
If you want to get your face closer to her breasts or her butt, use the grip button.


Enjoy her body in VR space.


By following the instructions on menu, you will be able to do more for her.

content_descriptors.notes:
Themes in this game include:
Explicit consensual sex scenes
Nudity
Genitalia
Indecent situations

Character depicted in this game are 18 years of age or older

name: VR SecretRoom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
